ygData.subject: Re: Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... continued to fight alongside his crew, and PHENIOX circled overhead, fireing ... eliminate the Maximal base! ... going to kill someone, get out of here

Message-ID: <50.4db38f2.2641dfdc@...>
Date: Wed, 3 May 2000 16:02:36 EDT
Subject: Re: Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

::: HELL BEAST, still missing half of his face plate and badly bruised 
continued to fight alongside his crew, and PHENIOX circled overhead, fireing 
streams of flame at random targets :::

::: HELL BEAST ::: Keep the Maximals busy while GREMLIN and the others 
eliminate the Maximal base!

~~~~~~~~

::: MEGATRON with RAT TRAP used several fallen Auto-bots as cover. That way 
there was little risk of damage :::

::: RATTRAP ::: I cant let you do this!

::: MEGATRON ignored him as he fired at one of the Maximals :::

::: Rat trap ::: Are you even listening to me?

::: MEGATRON, with his lifeless left arm, looks to the rat ::: If your not 
going to kill someone, get out of here vermine!

::: Rat trap glares at MEGATRON :: Oh...I'll kill someone alright....

::: The rat takes his gun and slams it to MEGATRONs temple and fires all in a 
matter of a seconed. The purple giant tumbles to the ground as mech fluid 
begins to flow from his head :::

::: MEGATRON ghasping :::.....Maximal....trash......

:: RAT TRAP fires at him one more time, this time at Megatron's face leaving 
a smoking crater. The two crimsom lights that served as his eyes faded as his 
chest sank for the last time :::

::: GREMLIN, overlooking the scene extends a hand ::: Cmon pal, lets go!

::: Rat trap and Gremlin barge out from the cover over to JACKLE and BALCK 
ARACNIA ::: 

::: BLACK ARACNIA ::: Wow, you toasted Meg-head!

::: Rat Trap ::: It was nothin really...

::: Jackle looks at the small bomb in his hands ::: Alright, this should at 
least cause some damage...

::: Gremlin ::: What about the Auto-bots and Decepticons?

::: Jackle ::: I think if we chuck it into the air vents Meg used, we can 
send a back draft right into the Maximal base, leaving the Arc undamaged.

::: Black aracnia nods ::: Ill cover you, just blow this joint!

::: Jackle hurls the bomb into the vent, giving it a 10 minute detenation 
fuse. Now all they had to do was get out of there. :::

::: Black aracnia went to look at Maegatron one last time. His body now 
lifeless and still. She gave him a swift kick for all the crap he put her 
through...and with a small slide he broke through the floor grating and his 
body sank like a rock through the Lava that flowed under the Arc :::

::: Black aracnia ::: My vendetta is paid you bastard!

~~~~~~~~~~

::: TRANSANULAS looks to Quickstrike :::: Well, you can take over the Pred 
base if you want. I on the other hand will remember your debt, but now I must 
go. If I hurry I can get into the battle. With your current condition I 
suggest you stay put until we can find a CR chamber. 

::: He began to leave, then turned ::: Ill be back.
